content.rendered:
Home

A new perspective for portfolio managers

Analyze public companies data across 15 valuation methods to find your edge with Valutico’s valuation software.

Whether you’re researching precedent transactions, comparing trading multiples across industries, or valuing a private company, Valutico powers your workflow efficiently. With insights from normalized and comprehensive financial data woven right into your models, you can streamline your valuation process, freeing you to focus on portfolio management and generate alpha.

Automated Reports Preparation

Spend less time transferring content from spreadsheets to slides and more time on value-added tasks

Lighting Fast Business Plan Creation

Use better assumptions in your models by leveraging our leading  benchmarks and analytical tools

Leading Market Data

Stop juggling subscriptions and filing reports away, market data is at your fingertips when you need it

Data-first platform

Leverage market data like never before

 

Comparable company analysis without the tedious work and with always-on data feed. With proprietary data on precedent transactions (800,000 transactions and counting, updated daily), including public and private transactions, alongside public company multiples and consensus estimates all normalized and calendarized for apples to apples comparisons.

Choose from search criteria—like industry, deal size or ownership stake, and refine your results with Valutico’s graph database of company descriptions and keywords, find the right valuation multiples across the public and private markets in seconds. Remove anything you don‘t want in your comps with one click.

Analyze multiple scenarios
Iterate on your model in the Valutico platform, or input/output excel files to collaborate with external partners, and create unlimited scenarios to represent various perspectives on any investment opportunity.

Share with collaborators or third parties
Produce bespoke reports or share web-views of your business valuations, preserving data and formula fidelity on your side while guarding the inner workings of your build.

Find out why leading Portfolio Managers use Valutico

Exceptional Valuation Platform

Valutico is the world‘s leading provider of web-based company valuation tools.

Savings Delivered

Valutico users can assess more deals and stocks with fewer resources

Transparent Calculations

Trust our model but own the data and audit any facet of the deliverables

Professional Grade

Your templates, your decisions, your reports. Valutico hides backstage but makes you shine

Express ROI

Affordable valuation toolset and guaranteed productivity gains. Valutico brings a new perspective for Hedge Funds managers without adding to the fund management costs

Testimonials & Case Studies

Martin Theyer
Managing Partner – PKF C&P

A powerful digital valuation process

“Valutico changed the game for us. We started using the software to do an upfront valuation in house, rather than analyzing the valuations brought to us. This made a big difference.”

Leonardo Pansardi Grisotto
Managing Partner – Zaxo M&A

Winning in client meetings with Valutico

“We prepare ourselves greatly before we engage with clients, and bring a lot of data to support our valuations. By bringing outside research to the table earlier than expected, we win more deals. Thanks to the variety of available peers and comparable transactions, from different countries, industries, and ranges of revenues, we can base our multiples on excellent, and defensible, market data.”
